Title: Relates to the powers and authority of the state commission on judicial conduct
Summary: Relates to complaints regarding judges and confidentiality of records; extends the jurisdiction of the state commission on judicial conduct as to judges who resign or retire while under investigation or formal charges.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to complaints regarding judges; and to extending the jurisdiction of the state commission on judicial conduct as to judges who resign or retire while under investigation or formal charges
